title: Give devs access to a ranked list of unmatched user search keywords from marketplace ->product ideas
body: The keywords people use in unsuccessful marketplace searches (particularly in the desktop Zune application) would, if ranked by frequency, provide useful information to developers on where to focus their development efforts. This would create more opportunities for developers while also helping to provide customers with the apps they want.

comments.body:
Strange, I actually thought that was a useful idea.
Oh well, the market has (or rather hasn't) spoken.
I made that title confusing, unfortunately (I didn't initially realise that I'd get to provide a description)
